solution_line_template: Each {painting_side_length} by {painting_side_length} painting is {area_5x5_painting} square feet because {painting_side_length} x {painting_side_length} = <<{painting_side_length}*{painting_side_length}={area_5x5_painting}>>{area_5x5_painting}

All {num_5x5_paintings} of them take up {total_area_5x5_paintings} square feet because {num_5x5_paintings} x {area_5x5_painting} = <<{num_5x5_paintings}*{area_5x5_painting}={total_area_5x5_paintings}>>{total_area_5x5_paintings}

The {painting_10x8_length} by {painting_10x8_width} painting takes up {area_10x8_painting} square feet because {painting_10x8_length} x {painting_10x8_width} = <<{painting_10x8_length}*{painting_10x8_width}={area_10x8_painting}>>{area_10x8_painting}

These four paintings take up {area_first_four_paintings} square feet because {area_10x8_painting} + {total_area_5x5_paintings} = <<{area_10x8_painting}+{total_area_5x5_paintings}={area_first_four_paintings}>>{area_first_four_paintings}

The final painting is {area_final_painting} square feet because {total_area_all_paintings}-{area_first_four_paintings} = <<{total_area_all_paintings}-{area_first_four_paintings}={area_final_painting}>>{area_final_painting}

If it is {final_painting_width_given_in_solution} feet wide it is {final_painting_height_calculated} feet tall because {area_final_painting} / {final_painting_width_given_in_solution} = {final_painting_height_calculated}
